Name: Harvest Fertility Boost
Notes: This is the shift placed on the Positive Affinity Multiplier for Harvesting. Applied on top of each positive affinity matchup.

Name: Harvest Bounty Boost
Notes: Overall multiplier on top of total harvest.

Name: Attack Threshold Shift
Notes: Top level shift on hp threshold % when triggering a liquidation.

Name: Attack Threshold Ratio
Notes: This is the shift placed on the Positive Affinity Multiplier when attacking. Applied to baseline threshold calc  Φ(ln(v1/y2)).

Name: Attack Spoils Ratio
Notes: Proportion of effective liquidation funds received as reward.

Name: Defense Threshold Shift
Notes: Top level shift on hp threshold % when defending.

Name: Defense Threshold Ratio
Notes: This is the shift placed on the Positive Affinity Multiplier when defending. Applied to baseline threshold calc  Φ(ln(v1/y2)).

Name: Defense Salvage Ratio
Notes: Proportion of harvest bounty salvaged when liquidated.

Name: Resting Recovery Boost
Notes: Multiplier on top of typical resting recovery rate.

Name: Strain Boost
Notes: Multiplier on kami hp drain when collecting musu.
